body: Pretty standard sex slave/Dom stuff. Love or hate the art, but in my opinion, the arts a little nasty. Rinkos mom keeps calling him a Shota, but he looks a bit old for that term. Story was alright though, kinda funny that his mom was a sex dom without him knowing. Overall, art is just meh, and the story is alright. Nothing special 5/10

yes, it is. thats what people do. they give their opinion on the work here. People that don't like this stuff, inevitably come and spout off how much they hate it or why its disgusting, yet they never had to read it. its super easy to skip over, but it never fails retards will read it anyway and act shocked by the clearly labeled content. So I choose to leave positive comments on stuff I like, my opinion as it were, instead of forcing myself to read something I don't like and leaving a negative opinion to make others feel shitty about themselves cus I can't use my brain to go "man, I bet this isn't my fetish with those pegging and strapon tags"
